main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Moriarty, New Mexico in 1952, involving silver disc-shaped objects, bright round silver-colored objects, and a spherical object with high-intensity white light, displaying high-speed, high-altitude flight and maneuverability.
interesting points: The objects were observed by reliable civilian and military witnesses, including airmen and radar operators.
The sightings involved UFOs displaying various maneuvers, such as hovering, shooting upwards against the wind, and accelerating and decelerating at high speeds.
Unidentified radar returns from objects described as 'round with definite shape, no trail, and no lights' were reported by credible observers.
The UFOs were observed to be highly illuminated, with impressive and unusual light patterns.

Possible explanations such as balloons and known aircraft were carefully considered, but the high-speed, high-altitude flight, and unusual maneuvers eliminated the possibility of conventional explanations.
sighted object: silver disc-shaped objects, bright round silver-colored objects, spherical object with high-intensity white light
witnesses: civilian and military witnesses including airmen, radar operators
photographs: the report indicates the presence of photographs
